text:
Karnataka BJP MLA Renukacharya disregards lockdown & social distancing to assemble a meeting of health workers. 

ASHA workers go door to door examining and reporting Coronavirus and are a high-risk group. 

Why is no action being taken against this, PM Modi? https://t.co/gDn1sOhLNI
